scripts.install-freezer: npm run install-rjs && node installer.js bundles/freezer
scripts.install-deploy: npm run install-freezer && node installer.js bundles/deploy
scripts.clean-posix: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf bundles/node_modules && rm -f package-lock.json && rm -f bundles/package-lock.json
scripts.clean-windows: rd /s /q node_modules && rd /s /q bundles\node_modules && del /f /q package-lock.json && del /f /q bundles\package-lock.json
scripts.clean: npm run clean-posix  --silent || npm run clean-windows --silent
